sentences.en: A butcher becomes a Buddha the moment he drops his cleaver.
Chicken Rice whacks it once side of her cleaver meat.
sentences.cn: “鸡肉饭女士”忙着剁鸡肉再切成片放在米饭的上边.

sentences.en: Echinacea purpurea root, Kola leaf, Milk Thistle seed , Cleaver herb , Nettle leaf, Burdock root , Rosehip shells.
sentences.cn: 紫松果,雷公根叶, 牛奶蓟, 牛筋草, 荨麻叶, 牛蒡, 玫瑰果.

sentences.en: In fact, a cleaver is a class of ax.
sentences.cn: 实际上，切肉刀也是斧子的一种。

sentences.en: Take out a meat cleaver and cut off their hand.
sentences.cn: 拿起切肉刀,砍断他们的手.

sentences.en: The intellect is a cleaver ; it discerns and rifts its way into the secret of things.
sentences.cn: 理智是一把利刃,它辨清方向,一路剖切直抵事物的奥秘之所在.

sentences.en: They are witty, cleaver and gifted, stern and kind, boastful and shy.
sentences.cn: 他们机智聪明或富有天赋 、 严厉或善良 、 自负或害羞.

sentences.en: Use the cleaver to cut the chicken.
You own your own meat cleaver and sharpen it.
sentences.cn: 你有自己的切肉刀而且你会磨它.

trans.tran_en: A cleaver is a knife with a large rectangular blade, used for chopping meat or vegetables
